Property

Class RealEstate

  • java.lang.Object
    • Property.Space
      • Property.Property
        • Property.RealEstate

  • public class RealEstate
extends Property
    The RealEstate class extends Property, inheriting all parameters from it. This class specifically keeps track of colored properties that is used for holding the number of houses on a particular colored property and for calculating the rent for these types of properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RealEstate

        public RealEstate(int owner,
                  int location,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  int price,
                  int costOfAHouse,
                  boolean hasMortgage,
                  java.lang.String color,
                  int numberOfHouses,
                  int numberForMonopoly,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> rents,
                  int gameID)
        Constructors - 11 parameters
        Parameters:
        owner - int stores the playerID that owns the property
        location - int stores the space on the board where the property is located
        name - String that holds the name of the property
        price - int stores the banks price for the property
        costOfAHouse - int stores the cost to a player to buy a house on the property
        hasMortgage - boolean stores the mortgage status of the real estate
        color - String that stores the color of the real estate
        numberOfHouses - int stores the number of houses on the property
        numberForMonopoly - int stores the number of the property color needed to have a real estate monopoly
        rents - ArrayList of Integer stores the rent list for different numbers of houses
        gameID - int stores the gameID for when multiple games are running at once
